meaningMnemonic: Things that make your <kanji>heart</kanji> <kanji>strong</kanji> are <vocabulary>reassuring</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>heartening</vocabulary> to hear. You can practically feel your heart becoming stronger in your chest.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the words 心 and 強い, so you should be able to read this on your own. Just note that つよい gets rendaku'd to づよい!
